item.title: Crazy First Person Crotch Rocket
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

What a wanker, someone should have knocked him off.

item.title: Crazy First Person Crotch Rocket
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:7, topic:195856”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=260395.msg2162155#msg2162155 date=1207420451]

This man have crossed the line between be good and crazy enough and be stupid and just dumb.

People like this should never been allowed to drive anything with more than 1 horsepower.

That means that they can’t walk either, as their feet generate 1.75 horsepower

You don’t drive your feet like a car.
So its ok to walk and run.

[/quote]

Explain Fred Flinstone.[/quote]
This man in the movie should not drive a motorbike, only walk and run there he can’t risk someones life.
That was that i mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Crazy First Person Crotch Rocket
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“Baros Rocks, post:10, topic:195856”][quote author=ninja nub link=topic=260395.msg2162626#msg2162626 date=1207430113]

Explain Fred Flinstone.

Ok, let’s stop arguing about Fred Flinstone lol.

He’s a fictional character?

But he still drove cars with his feet.
[/quote]

He doesn’t drive a car, that like saying a skateboard is a car.[/quote]

item.title: Crazy First Person Crotch Rocket
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

He didn’t do anything impressive In fact he did rather a lot of stupid things.

Kinda pisses me off really, gives us all a bad name.

EDIT: Just to make clear, I didn’t mean the wheelieing or the speeding, I’m always up for a laugh. The riding really close behind trucks at 80mph+ and the riding so fast around bends when he clearly can’t handle it, on the other hand…

Read full topic
